Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_3D_sample_obstruction

The function AIL_3D_sample_obstruction retrieves the current obstruction level of the given sample.

F32 AIL_3D_sample_obstruction(
  H3DSAMPLE S
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle to query.

Discussion

Obstructions mean that the direct path of the sound is blocked, but an indirect path is still available - a sound playing from behind a crate, for example.

By default, samples are completely non-obstructed.

On most providers, obstructions are emulated with volume control. On the EAX 2 provider, however, obstructions are performed in hardware and sound really cool (you can still hear reflections because they bounce around the obstruction).

Example files that use this function: EXAM3D.C


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_sample_occlusion, AIL_set_3D_sample_obstruction
